render-setting-des: If sets true, game will render mana bar.
bar-x-position-des:
Sets 'X' Axis offset.
If value is too big, bar can render baggily.
bar-y-position-des:
Sets 'Y' Axis offset.
If value is too big, bar can render baggily.
size-multiplier-des: Sets bar size multiplier, that applies when you extend maximum level of mana.
